front.title: Prefix Management for Mobile IPv6 Fast Handover on Point-to-Point Links

abstract.t: The Mobile IPv6 Fast Handovers (FMIPv6) specification currently does not explicitly define prefix management over point-to-point links when a Mobile Node (MN) uses a prefix to formulate a new Care-of- Address (CoA). In this document a mechanism is developed for assigning unique prefixes to the MN by the Previous Access Router (PAR). The New Access Router (NAR) dynamically assigns a unique prefix called dedicated prefix to any MN that is performing a handover. Both reactive and predictive modes of FMIPv6 are explained.
